member.name: M:MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.INavigationService.NavigateToAsync``1(System.Object,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Navigates to the bindable page matching the given navigable view model type.
member.param: The parameter passed to the view model Load method.
True if we want a modal navigation.
Navigate and clears the stack history (the new view become the new navigation root)

member.name: M:MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.INavigationService.NavigateToAsync``1(``0,MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.NavigationTransition,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Navigates to the bindable page matching the given navigable view model type + the given transition.
member.example: FullAutoPatientAssayScreenVm + NavigationTransition.ToResult => navigates to a PatientAssayResultView
member.param: Navigates and makes the new view a child from the root page.

member.summary: Navigation from menu means: reset the stack, and then add the new page.

member.name: T:MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.IViewLocator
member.summary: Service responsible for locating the correct view from the ViewModel infos. The service is currently also responsible for the creation of the view and the view model if needed.

member.name: M:MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.IViewLocator.GetViewFor``1
member.summary: Builds the view matching the given view model type. Builds the view model and bind it to the created view. Loads the view model.

member.name: M:MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.IViewLocator.GetViewFor``1(``0,MauiSample.Presentation.Navigables.NavigationTransition)
member.summary: Builds the view matching the given [view model type + transition]. Binds the view model instance to the created view.
member.param: The view model to be bound to the created view.
The transition leading to the view.
member.remarks: The service regards the view model as already loaded.
